title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Beat the eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture.

title: Vegan Salad Bowl
description: A healthy mix of fresh vegetables and grains, perfect for vegans.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Chop vegetables and mix in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
